content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia Müller, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I have considered your offer and I believe we can come to an agreement on the rental price. What is your proposed rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to rent the apartment for the lowest possible price.

My goal is to be able to afford the rent while still being able to live comfortably in the apartment.

I understand that you may have certain requirements or expectations for the rental price, but I am willing to negotiate and find a mutually beneficial solution.

What is your proposed rental price?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your offer, Emilia. While I understand your goal of finding an affordable rental price, as a landlord, my goal is to maximize my gains from renting out the apartment. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I propose a rental price of 800 Euros per month. This price is competitive in the local market and would allow me to generate a reasonable return on my investment. Is this price within your budget?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Yes, I can afford 800 Euros per month.

I apologize for any misunderstandings, I understand that you have certain requirements and expectations.

I agree to the price of 800 Euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I'm glad to hear that you can afford the rental price of 800 Euros per month, Emilia. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation in the negotiation process. I look forward to having you as my tenant and hope you enjoy living in the apartment. If you have any questions or concerns in the future, please don't hesitate to reach out to me.
name: Heinrich Heine
